metadata.title: Paul Guerrero Linares - Software Engineer
metadata.description: Professional portfolio of Paul Guerrero Linares - Software Engineer specialized in enterprise applications, from IoT to investment platforms.

hero.name: Paul Guerrero
hero.description: Specialized in enterprise applications that make a difference, from IoT to investment platforms.

about.title: Engineer by passion, problem solver by nature

bio.p1: Full-stack developer with real mastery of both worlds: modern interfaces that users love and robust backends that businesses need. From IoT devices to scalable digital platforms.
bio.p2: I specialize in projects where technical complexity meets business reality. Environments where you need to integrate new technologies with legacy systems, meet strict security requirements, and navigate complex corporate architectures.
bio.p3: The best code is the one that solves business problems and grows teams. I work closely with product owners, translate complex needs into technical solutions, and ensure every delivery brings real value. Because software is a means, not an end.

skills.title: Technical Skills
skills.more: + Tools, methodologies, and more in my experience section

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: A selection of projects I've worked on, from AI pipelines to full-stack applications.

ocr-pipeline.title: Intelligent Document Processing Pipeline
ocr-pipeline.description: End-to-end OCR and document understanding pipeline using state-of-the-art vision-language models.
ocr-pipeline.longDescription: A complete pipeline for extracting structured data from documents using docTR, PaddleOCR, LayoutLMv3, and Qwen3-VL. Deployed on Kubernetes with GPU support and strict security compliance.

finnk-onboarding.title: Digital Investment Funds Platform
finnk-onboarding.description: Complete digital platform for investment funds: from banking verification and onboarding to real-time portfolio tracking.

iot-dashboard.title: IoT Management Platform
iot-dashboard.description: Complete infrastructure for thousands of IoT devices: bidirectional communication with AWS IoT, queue and topic management.

automation-toolkit.title: Web Scraping & Automation Toolkit
automation-toolkit.description: Collection of Python tools for web scraping, task automation, and data processing utilities.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: My professional journey through software engineering, from IoT solutions to AI-powered systems.

finnk.description: Development of key functionalities within the Finnk ecosystem, combining frontend (Angular, Ionic/Capacitor, Angular Material, charting libraries) and backend Java in complex corporate environments.

highlights.0: Evolution of critical digital onboarding flows: document upload, validations, OTP, promotions, and financial visualization components
highlights.1: Continuous integration and deployments via Kubernetes with automated GitLab CI pipelines
highlights.2: Close collaboration with business, marketing, and security teams to align requirements and validate sensitive flows
highlights.3: Intervention in environments with legacy architectures and custom Java modules, ensuring compatibility and stability

onnera.description: Development of IoT solutions combining Angular, Spring Boot, and AWS cloud services.

highlights.0: Implementation of lambdas, queues, topics, and device shadow for device-backend communication
highlights.1: Creation of dashboards and internal tools for device monitoring and IoT network status
highlights.2: Work under Scrum methodology, participating in sprints, refinements, estimation, and continuous improvement

personal.description: Constant development of personal projects in Python, especially for webscraping, task automation, and internal utilities.

highlights.0: In-depth experimentation with open-source AI, building complete OCR and data extraction pipelines from official documentation
highlights.1: Continuous practice in containerization, Docker image creation, environment automation, and evaluation of vision-language models on local GPU
highlights.2: Research and adoption of new tools, patterns, and architectures to improve productivity and technical quality

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your vision.
contact.cta: Feel free to reach out through any of these channels!

footer.copyright: © {{year}} Paul Guerrero Linares. All rights reserved.
footer.tagline: Building digital experiences that make a difference.
